page.title: 20WEST FELTON ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
GENERALLY ENTERTAINMENT FOR THE VILLAGE TAKES PLACE IN THE VILLAGE HALL,AND VARIES FROM FORTNIGHTLY BINGO SESSIONS TO OCCASIONAL BARN DANCES,CHORAL CONCERTS,DISCOS FOR TEENAGERS AND AN ANNUAL PANTOMIME PUT ON BY A TRAVELLING THEATRE COMPANY. AN ANNUAL FIREWORKS DISPLAY IS ORGANISED BY THE ROYAL BRITISH LEGION,AND LIKEWISE A VILLAGE SPORTS,INCLUDING RACES,5-A-SIDE FOOTBALL AND ROUNDERS.
THE INFORMATION FOR THIS AREA WAS PREPARED AND COLLATED BY THE HEADMASTER,STAFF AND PUPILS OF WEST FELTON C.E.SCHOOL,ASSISTED BY PARENTS AND OTHER MEMBERS OF THE VILLAGE COMMUNITY.
